name: Stay Awake (AlexHopkins) (AlexHopkins)
description:
Have you ever had a dream that was so strange that you remembered it the next day? When remembering that dream, have you ever felt like it was trying to warn you? What would you do if things you saw in your dream began to happen in your life? In the game Stay Awake, this phenomenon is explored, and the consequences are realized. Stay Awake will take the player into their minds, and test whether they trust their dreams, or what they believe is reality. In this world, every decision you make, or don't make... will matter.

Download the zip file and unzip the entire folder. Keep the game and game files in the unzipped file and run the game. If the audio or image files are moved from the file they are in, the game's audio or background will not work.
